column2: Uchi was a fantastic experience--the service was friendly
column4: and many of the dishes were excellent (though others were underwhelming). However
column5: the prices of the small plates of food really added up
column6: and the value probably wasn't the greatest for the amount of food we got. While I might not be in a rush to be back
column7: I definitely left happy and would recommend Uchi for a fun night out.
